description: A chronic inflammatory condition of the gastrointestinal tract, characterized by symptoms such as abdominal pain and diarrhea.
A protein complex that plays a crucial role in regulating immune responses and inflammation.
A protein kinase involved in the MAPK/ERK signaling pathway, important for cell division and differentiation.
A serine/threonine kinase that plays a key role in multiple cellular processes, including glucose metabolism and cell survival.
A pro-inflammatory cytokine involved in various immune responses.
A cytokine involved in systemic inflammation and a member of a group of proteins involved in the acute phase reaction.
A cytokine that is critical for innate and adaptive immunity against viral and intracellular bacterial infections.
